org.gephi.desktop.datalab

Class AvailableColumnsModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gephi.desktop.datalab.AvailableColumnsModel

  • public class AvailableColumnsModel
extends Object
    Class to keep available state (in data laboratory) of the columns of a table of a workspace. Useful, but also necessary to limit the maximum number of available columns when there are a lot of columns.
    Author:
    Eduardo

      • addAvailableColumn

        public boolean addAvailableColumn(org.gephi.graph.api.Column column)
        Add a column as available if it can be added.
        Parameters:
        column - Column to add
        Returns:
        True if the column was successfully added, false otherwise (no more columns can be available)

      • removeAvailableColumn

        public boolean removeAvailableColumn(org.gephi.graph.api.Column column)
        Remove an available column from the model if possible.
        Parameters:
        column - Column to make not available
        Returns:
        True if the column could be removed
